19 DiscreteTransferFunction::DiscreteTransferFunction(const std::string& pConfigFilePath) :
20  ConfigManager("FTParametersManager"),
21  aConfigFilePath(pConfigFilePath)
22 {
23  init(); // Les attributs de classe seront mis à jour après cette fonction
24  setZero();
25 }

34 DiscreteTransferFunction::DiscreteTransferFunction(int pNbTransferFunction,
35  const TransferFunctionCoefficient& pTransferFunctionCoefficient,
36  int pFilterOrder) :
37  ConfigManager("FTParametersManager"), // Pas utilisé, mais obligatoirement construit
38  aFilterOrder(pFilterOrder),
39  aNbTransferFunction(pNbTransferFunction),
40  aTransferFunctionCoefficient(pTransferFunctionCoefficient)
41 {
42  setZero();
43 }
44 
50 Eigen::VectorXd DiscreteTransferFunction::update(const Eigen::VectorXd& pError)
51 {
52  aErrorHistory.col(0) = pError;
53  aFilterResult = filterXOrder();
54  updateHistory();
55  aOutputHistory.col(0) = aFilterResult;
56  return aFilterResult;
57 }
58 
64 std::vector<double> DiscreteTransferFunction::updateVector(const Eigen::VectorXd& pError)
65 {
66  Eigen::VectorXd lEigen = update(pError);
67  return std::vector<double>(lEigen.data(), lEigen.data() + lEigen.rows() * lEigen.cols());
68 }
69 
73 void DiscreteTransferFunction::updateHistory()
74 {
75  Eigen::ArrayXXd lOutputHistory = Eigen::ArrayXXd::Zero(aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder);
76  Eigen::ArrayXXd lErrorHistory = Eigen::ArrayXXd::Zero(aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder + 1);
77  lOutputHistory.matrix().block(0, 1, aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder - 1) =
78  aOutputHistory.matrix().block(0, 0, aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder - 1);
79  lErrorHistory.matrix().block(0, 1, aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder) =
80  aErrorHistory.matrix().block(0, 0, aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder);
81  aOutputHistory = lOutputHistory;
82  aErrorHistory = lErrorHistory;
83 }
84 
89 Eigen::VectorXd DiscreteTransferFunction::filterXOrder() const
90 {
91  Eigen::VectorXd lNumeratorResult = (aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aNumeratorFactor * aErrorHistory).rowwise().sum();
92  Eigen::VectorXd lDenominatorResult = (aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aDenominatorFactor * aOutputHistory).rowwise().sum();
93  return lNumeratorResult - lDenominatorResult;
94 }
95 
99 void DiscreteTransferFunction::setZero()
100 {
101  aFilterResult = Eigen::VectorXd::Zero(aNbTransferFunction);
102  aOutputHistory = Eigen::ArrayXXd::Zero(aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder);
103  aErrorHistory = Eigen::ArrayXXd::Zero(aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder + 1);
104 }
105 
110 void DiscreteTransferFunction::onDynamicReconfigureChange(const FTParametersConfig& pConfig)
111 {
112  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aDenominatorFactor.row(0)
113  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_denominator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_denominator3;
114  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aNumeratorFactor.row(0)
115  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_numerator1, pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_numerator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_numerator3;
116 
117  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aDenominatorFactor.row(1)
118  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_denominator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_denominator3;
119  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aNumeratorFactor.row(1)
120  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_numerator1, pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_numerator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_numerator3;
121 
122  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aDenominatorFactor.row(2)
123  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_denominator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_denominator3;
124  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aNumeratorFactor.row(2)
125  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_numerator1, pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_numerator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_numerator3;
126 
127  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aDenominatorFactor.row(3)
128  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_denominator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_denominator3;
129  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aNumeratorFactor.row(3)
130  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_numerator1, pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_numerator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_numerator3;
131 
132  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aDenominatorFactor.row(4)
133  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_denominator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_denominator3;
134  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aNumeratorFactor.row(4)
135  << pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_numerator1, pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_numerator2, pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_numerator3;
136 }
137 
142 void DiscreteTransferFunction::writeConfigFile(const FTParametersConfig& pConfig)
143 {
144  YAML::Emitter lOut;
145  lOut.SetIndent(4);
146 
147  lOut << YAML::BeginMap;
148  lOut << YAML::Comment("Ces paramètres ne peuvent pas être modifiés dynamiquement");
149  lOut << YAML::Key << "filter_order";
150  lOut << YAML::Value << aFilterOrder;
151  lOut << YAML::Key << "nb_functionTransfer";
152  lOut << YAML::Value << aNbTransferFunction;
153  lOut << YAML::EndMap << YAML::Newline;
154 
155  lOut << YAML::BeginMap;
156  lOut << YAML::Comment("Ces paramètres peuvent être modifiés dynamiquement");
157  lOut << YAML::Key << "FunctionTransfer1";
158  lOut << YAML::Value << YAML::BeginMap;
159  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_1" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_numerator1;;
160  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_numerator2;
161  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_numerator3;
162  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_denominator2;
163  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_denominator3;
164  lOut << YAML::EndMap << YAML::Newline;
165 
166  lOut << YAML::Key << "FunctionTransfer2";
167  lOut << YAML::Value << YAML::BeginMap;
168  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_1" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_numerator1;;
169  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_numerator2;
170  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_numerator3;
171  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_denominator2;
172  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_denominator3;
173  lOut << YAML::EndMap << YAML::Newline;
174 
175  lOut << YAML::Key << "FunctionTransfer3";
176  lOut << YAML::Value << YAML::BeginMap;
177  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_1" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_numerator1;;
178  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_numerator2;
179  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_numerator3;
180  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_denominator2;
181  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_denominator3;
182  lOut << YAML::EndMap << YAML::Newline;
183 
184  lOut << YAML::Key << "FunctionTransfer4";
185  lOut << YAML::Value << YAML::BeginMap;
186  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_1" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_numerator1;;
187  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_numerator2;
188  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_numerator3;
189  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_denominator2;
190  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_denominator3;
191  lOut << YAML::EndMap << YAML::Newline;
192 
193  lOut << YAML::Key << "FunctionTransfer5";
194  lOut << YAML::Value << YAML::BeginMap;
195  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_1" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_numerator1;;
196  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_numerator2;
197  lOut << YAML::Key << "numerator_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_numerator3;
198  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_2" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_denominator2;
199  lOut << YAML::Key << "denominateur_3" << YAML::Value << pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_denominator3;
200  lOut << YAML::EndMap;
201  lOut << YAML::EndMap;
202 
203  std::ofstream lOfs(aConfigFilePath);
204  lOfs << lOut.c_str();
205 }

213 void DiscreteTransferFunction::readConfigFile(FTParametersConfig& pConfig)
214 {
215  YAML::Node node = YAML::LoadFile(aConfigFilePath);
216 
217  aFilterOrder = node["filter_order"].as<size_t>();
218  aNbTransferFunction = node["nb_functionTransfer"].as<size_t>();
219 
220  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aNumeratorFactor = Eigen::ArrayXXd::Zero(aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder + 1);
221  aTransferFunctionCoefficient.aDenominatorFactor = Eigen::ArrayXXd::Zero(aNbTransferFunction, aFilterOrder);
222 
223  pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_numerator1 = node["FunctionTransfer1"]["numerator_1"].as<double>();
224  pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_numerator2 = node["FunctionTransfer1"]["numerator_2"].as<double>();
225  pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_numerator3 = node["FunctionTransfer1"]["numerator_3"].as<double>();
226  pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_denominator2 = node["FunctionTransfer1"]["denominateur_2"].as<double>();
227  pConfig.FunctionTransfer1_denominator3 = node["FunctionTransfer1"]["denominateur_3"].as<double>();
228 
229  pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_numerator1 = node["FunctionTransfer2"]["numerator_1"].as<double>();
230  pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_numerator2 = node["FunctionTransfer2"]["numerator_2"].as<double>();
231  pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_numerator3 = node["FunctionTransfer2"]["numerator_3"].as<double>();
232  pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_denominator2 = node["FunctionTransfer2"]["denominateur_2"].as<double>();
233  pConfig.FunctionTransfer2_denominator3 = node["FunctionTransfer2"]["denominateur_3"].as<double>();
234 
235  pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_numerator1 = node["FunctionTransfer3"]["numerator_1"].as<double>();
236  pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_numerator2 = node["FunctionTransfer3"]["numerator_2"].as<double>();
237  pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_numerator3 = node["FunctionTransfer3"]["numerator_3"].as<double>();
238  pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_denominator2 = node["FunctionTransfer3"]["denominateur_2"].as<double>();
239  pConfig.FunctionTransfer3_denominator3 = node["FunctionTransfer3"]["denominateur_3"].as<double>();
240 
241  pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_numerator1 = node["FunctionTransfer4"]["numerator_1"].as<double>();
242  pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_numerator2 = node["FunctionTransfer4"]["numerator_2"].as<double>();
243  pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_numerator3 = node["FunctionTransfer4"]["numerator_3"].as<double>();
244  pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_denominator2 = node["FunctionTransfer4"]["denominateur_2"].as<double>();
245  pConfig.FunctionTransfer4_denominator3 = node["FunctionTransfer4"]["denominateur_3"].as<double>();
246 
247  pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_numerator1 = node["FunctionTransfer5"]["numerator_1"].as<double>();
248  pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_numerator2 = node["FunctionTransfer5"]["numerator_2"].as<double>();
249  pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_numerator3 = node["FunctionTransfer5"]["numerator_3"].as<double>();
250  pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_denominator2 = node["FunctionTransfer5"]["denominateur_2"].as<double>();
251  pConfig.FunctionTransfer5_denominator3 = node["FunctionTransfer5"]["denominateur_3"].as<double>();
252 
253 }
